body: kin.ai will teach you the 3000 most important Chinese characters with easy-to-remember stories instead of rote memorization.
We've ordered the Chinese alphabet for you, from simple characters to the more complicated ones. By the time you reach a character, you'll have learned all the parts that make it up.
But not all simple characters are common, and not all common characters are simple. We've designed a course where the important stuff comes first.
Once you've learned the core meaning of a character, we'll show you the words you can make with it. Your knowledge will grow exponentially with every character you learn.
We'll also make sure you won't confuse the character with other characters that have a similar appearance or meaning.
